entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%

Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate.
